Note: Date based on the date of the battle of Château-Thierry. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for a newspaper and magazine advertisement for a Liberty Loan campaign. Text tells that American shells used to fight off the Germans were bought with your Liberty bonds.  Illustration shows American boys facing the bridge where the Germans tried to pass at Château-Thierry and were stopped.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: The turning point of the war
